name: Marimba VRCade
summary:
Exercises
Warm up by running through some practice scale exercise

Songs
Play from a list of 20+ marimba songs and compete on the leaderboards!

Practice
Struggling with a specific part of a song? Practice mode lets you select a specific section from a song, alter the tempo, and practice it over and over.

Concerts
Play from a variety of concerts/locations. Each concert consists of three songs back-to-back in front of an audience. Do well, earn the audience's praise, and compete for a high score on the...
